about_the_game:
This pack of twenty tracks jacks in the sounds of soaring synths, heavy guitars, electronic beats and otherworldly textures to fill up your futuristic games. Whether you're dreaming of electric sheep or tackling terminators, composer Joel Steudler has you covered. Also includes fifteen Music Events for short dramatic moments!

Features:

* 20 music tracks suitable for battle, drones, dungeons, menus, themes and towns!
* 15 ME Musical Events for short dramatic moments!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included.
* Royalty free music for use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

Battle - Cyborg Ninjas
Battle - Electric Pulsar
Battle - Replicant Race
Battle - Scrap Metal
Battle - War Machine
Drone - Industrial Organs
Drone - Processing Substation
Dungeon - The Cage
Dungeon - Undercity Tunnels
Menu - External Memory
Menu - Thought Patterns
Theme - Lost Stars
Theme - Organic Growth
Theme - Time Drift
Theme - Wide Wonder
Town - Elysian Towers
Town - Neo Tokyo
Town - Section Nine
Town - Unknown Ecology
Town - Wetware Shop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Face the future with twenty tracks of synthetic sound suitable for cyborgs, humans and replicants alike!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
